Concepts.definition: An age group comprised of individuals who are not yet an adult. The specific cut-off age will vary by purpose.

Property.preferredDefinition: Depression; a mental state of depressed mood characterised by feelings of sadness, despair and discouragement. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

ReferenceDocuments.name: A questionnaire to measure de
ReferenceDocuments.description: A questionnaire to measure depression (major depressive disorder, MDD), a mood disorder characterized by one or more major depressive episodes (2-week period of loss of interest or pleasure in nearly all activities) without manic, mixed or hypomanic episodes
